item.name: Signin User verify OTP Forgot Password Step 2
Follower/Following

request.description: The "`/users/:userId/follow`" API endpoint facilitates the process of users following another user within the application, enabling them to stay updated on the followed user's activities and content. This feature supports community building, content discovery, and engagement within the platform.

variable.description: A userId is a unique identifier associated with an individual user within a system or application, typically used for tracking user-specific data and interactions.

request.description: The "`/users/:userId/unfollow`" API endpoint empowers users to sever their connection with another user within the application, effectively ceasing updates and content from that user in their feed. This feature offers users control over their network and fosters a more personalized and curated user experience.

variable.description: A userId is a unique identifier associated with an individual user within a system or application, typically used for tracking user-specific data and interactions.

request.description: The "`/users/:userId/unfollow`" API endpoint empowers users to sever their connection with another user within the application, effectively ceasing updates and content from that user in their feed. This feature offers users control over their network and fosters a more personalized and curated user experience.

variable.description: A userId is a unique identifier associated with an individual user within a system or application, typically used for tracking user-specific data and interactions.

query.description: Refers to the specific subset or segment of data being displayed or retrieved, typically identified by an integer value representing the page number.
Refers to the maximum number of items or records displayed on each page, controlling the quantity of data presented or retrieved at once.

request.description: The "`/users/:userId/following`" API endpoint enhances user interactions within the application by allowing users to retrieve a list of profiles they are currently following. By specifying their unique user identifier (":userId") in the endpoint, users can access a comprehensive list of profiles they have chosen to follow, facilitating content discovery and engagement.

response.name: Get Users Following

variable.description: A userId is a unique identifier associated with an individual user within a system or application, typically used for tracking user-specific data and interactions.

item.description: "**Follower/Following**" is a common social networking concept that represents the relationship between users within the application. A "**Follower**" is an individual who has chosen to subscribe to or track another user's profile, allowing them to see the content and updates posted by that user. Conversely, the "**Following**" status denotes a user's decision to track or subscribe to the posts and activities of another user. This mutual connection allows for a more personalized and interactive experience, as users can stay informed about the content and updates from profiles they follow and build a network of connections within the platform. It encourages engagement, community-building, and the exchange of information and interests among users.

request.description: The "`/users/:userId/followers`" API endpoint is a valuable feature that allows users to retrieve a list of users who are following them within the application. By specifying their unique user identifier (":userId") in the endpoint, users can access a comprehensive list of profiles that have chosen to follow them, facilitating engagement and community building.

request.description: The "`users/me/settings/post-categories`" API endpoint allows users to get their preferences related to post categories within the application.

item.name: Post Liking

query.description: Refers to the specific subset or segment of data being displayed or retrieved, typically identified by an integer value representing the page number.
Refers to the maximum number of items or records displayed on each page, controlling the quantity of data presented or retrieved at once.

request.description: The "`/posts/:postId/likes`" endpoint provides a list of users who have expressed their approval or "liked" a particular post identified by its unique "postId." It allows users, content creators, or administrators to view and access the names, profiles, or identifiers of individuals who have shown their appreciation for the post by liking it.

The "`/posts/:postId/like`" endpoint enables users to express their approval or appreciation for a particular post by liking it. Liking a post is a common social interaction on many platforms, and this endpoint allows users to engage with content they find interesting or enjoyable.

The "`/posts/:postId/unlike`" endpoint enables users to retract their previous approval or "like" from a particular post. It allows users to undo their liking action if they no longer wish to express support or appreciation for the post.

item.description: "Post liking" is a feature commonly found in social media and content-sharing platforms that allows users to express their approval, appreciation, or interest in a particular post by clicking a "like" or "thumbs-up" button. It is a form of positive engagement and interaction with content shared by other users or accounts within the platform.

request.description: The "`/posts/:postId/comments`" endpoint provides users with a way to access and view comments made by other users on a particular post. It allows users to engage with the discussions and conversations related to the post's content.

request.description: The "`/treats/buy-coin-options`" endpoint is part of a virtual currency system within the pet-related application, where users have the option to purchase virtual coins, often referred to as "unleash coin." These virtual treats serve as a digital currency used exclusively for buying pet treats and related items within the app. Users can explore various purchase options, each offering different quantities of virtual coins in exchange for real-world currency, enabling them to enhance their pets' experiences, provide treats, and engage more deeply with the application's features.
